name: insomnia (GMTK Game Jam 2021)
description:
Being awake sucks, but sleeping is hard.

Go to sleep and collect some bunnies. There are 5 to collect. Try not to wake up.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move.

Use Shift or Spacebar to dash. You can move through walls while dashing.

Your health and vision are joined together. Taking damage causes you to lose your grip on the dream.

-----

This was my first ever game jam. It was a great learning experience!

For example, I made some mistakes with prioritization and budgeting time. The game is pretty rushed and unpolished. I didn't even have time to add an ending.

Sorry about that. I hope you enjoy it anyway!
